Cati Shamuipi, jariyaj, na alita ruraj jupa laya rupachishca canga—Elías tigramunga chai jatun manllanayai punlla nara cajpi—Malaquías 4-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 26

Jesús aliguta villan tucui cuzascunata callarimanda tucurinacaman—Uchilla huahuacuna, huahuacunapash parlan juyailla cuzascunata na quilcashca cai ushajta—Cristopaj iglesiamandacuna charin tucui cuzascunata pacta paipuracuna. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 27

Jesús mandan paicunata Iglesiata paipaj shutipi shutichichun—Paipaj misión, shujpa juchamanda huañui sacrificiopash paipaj quishpiringapa villaicuna can—Runacuna mandashca can arrepentirichun, bautizarichun paicuna achilyachishca cachun Espíritu Santohuan—Paicuna cana can imashna Jesús can shina laya. Nara C.H. 34–35.

3 Nefi 28

Chunga ishcaimanda iscun munan, nishcapachacunapash can shuj chasquinata Cristopaj reinopi imaura paicuna huañujpi—Quimsa Nefitacuna munan huañui jahuapa ushaita cushcapash can shina cai ushachun alpapi imaura Jesús cutin shamungacaman—Paicuna apashca can, ricunbash cuzascunata villai na saquishcata, paicuna cunan runacunapi achil yachachinajun. Nara C.H. 34–35.

3 Nefi 29

Mormónpaj Quilcashca llujshimui shuj señal can Apunchij callarishca Israelta tandachita paipaj conveniocunata pactachijpash—Maijan na cazun paipaj achil ricuchishcacunata, carashcacunata tucuri punllapi llaquichishca canga. Nara C.H. 34–35.

3 Nefi 30

Tucuri punllapaj Gentilcuna mandashca can arrepentirichun, Cristoman shamuna, yupashca cachun Israelpaj huasihuan. Nara C.H. 34–35.

4 Nefi

Nefitacuna, Lamanitacunapash tucuilla tigrarin Apunchijpaman—Paicuna tucui cuzascunata pacta charin, juyailla ruraita ricuchicunata ruran, pambapi ali miranbash—Ishcai patsaj huatacuna jipa, chaupiricuna, na alicunata ruraicuna, yanga iglesiacuna, na ricunayachishpa catiriaicuna jatarirca—Quimsa patsaj huatacuna jipa, Nefitacuna, Lamanitacuna na ali rurajcuna can—Ammorón pacan achil tandachishpa quilcashcacunata. Nara C.H. 35–321.

Mormón






Mormón 1

Ammarón yachachin Mormónman achil tandachishca quilcashcacunamanda—Macanajuicuna callarin Nefitacunahuan, Lamanitacunahuan—Quimsa Nefitacuna apai tucushca can—Na alita ruraicuna, na crina, hechicería, brujeríacunapash ashtahuan tian. Nara C.H. 321–326.

Mormón 2

Mormón Nefitacunapaj macanajuj runacunata pushan—Yahuar huañuchishpa tucuchicunapash tiarca alpa jahuapi—Nefitacuna quijarin, huacanbash llaquichi tucushcacunapaj llaquihuan—Paicunapaj ninan juyai punlla yalishca can—Mormón chasquin Nefipaj jirru fangacunata—Macanajuicuna catin. Nara C.H. 327–350.

Mormón 3

Mormón Nefitacunaman arrepentimientota yachachin—Paicuna jatun mishaita charin paicunapaj shinllicaipi jariyan—Mormón paicunata na pushasha nin, paipaj achil mañaicuna paicunamanda fe illa can—Mormónpaj Quilcashca cumbidan chunga ishcai Israelpaj tribucunata quishpiringapa villaicunapi crichun. Nara C.H. 360–362.

Mormón 4

Macanajui, huañuchishpa tucuchicuna catirca—Na alita rurajcuna castigan na alita rurajcunata—Imaurapash shina na tiashca jatun na ali ruraicuna yali miran tucui Israelpi—Huarmicuna, huahuacunapash yanga diosman sacrificashca can—Lamanitacuna paicunapaj ñaupamanda Nefitacunata calpachi callarin. Nara C.H. 363–375.

Mormón 5

Mormón cutin Nefita macanajuj runacunata pushan huañuchishpa tucuchina macanajuicunapi—Mormónpaj Quilcashca llujshimun convencengapa tucui Israelta Jesús Cristo cajta—Paicunapaj na crimanda, Lamanitacuna caiman chaiman chajchui tucushca can, Espíritu paicunahuan macanajuita saquinga—Paicuna chasquinga quishpiringapa villaicunata Gentilcunamanda tucuri punllacunapi. Nara C.H. 375–384.

Mormón 6

Nefitacuna tandanajun Cumorahpaj alpapi tucuri macanajuipa—Mormón pacan achil quilcashcacunata Cumorah urcupi—Lamanitacuna mishan, Nefita jatun llacta tucurishca can—Huaranga huarangacuna espadahuan huañuchishca can. Nara C.H. 385.

Mormón 7

Mormón Lamanitacunata cumbidan tucuri punllacunapi Cristopi crichun, paipaj quishpiringapa villaicunata chasquichun, quishpirichunbash—Tucui maijan Bibliapi crin Mormónpaj Quilcashcatapash cringa. Nara C.H 385.

Mormón 8

Lamanitacuna mascan, tucuchinbash Nefitacunata—Mormónpaj Quilcashca llujshimunga Diospaj ushaihuan—Llaquicunata villashca can maijan Apunchijpaj ruraipaj contra, fiñai, macanajui samaita aisajcunapaj jahuapi—Nefitapaj quilcashca llujshimunga na alita rurai, jucha rurai, apostasía punllapi. Nara C.H. 400–421.

Mormón 9

Moroni cayan maijan Cristopi na crijcunata arrepentirichun—Pai villan shuj Dios juyailla ruraita ricuchicunapaj, pimi cun achil ricuchicunata jichanbash caraicunata, señalcunatapash fielcuna jahuapi—Juyailla ruraita ricuchinacuna tucurin na crijcunamanda—Señalcuna catin maijan crijcunata—Runacunata yachajcuna cachun cutin yarichishca can rurachunbacha saquishcacunata alichichunbash. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Éter






Éter 1

Moroni tandachin Éterpaj quilcashcacunata—Éterpaj genealogíata rijsichishca can—Jareditacunapaj shimirimaicunata na pandachishca can Babelpaj Torrepi—Apunchij paicunata pushasha ninbacha shuj ajllashca alpaman paicunata rurangapa shuj jatun llactata.

Éter 2

Jareditacuna prepararin ringapa cushapacha nishca pambaman—Cai can shuj ajllashca alpa maipi runacuna Cristota sirvinapacha nacashpa tucuchishca canga—Apunchij parlan Jaredpaj huauquihuan quimsa horascunata—Jareditacuna ruran barcocunata—Apunchij tapun Jaredpaj huauquita ima laya barcocuna punchayachishca canata nichun.

Éter 3

Jaredpaj huauqui ricun Apunchijpaj dedota imashna pai tacarin chunga sujta rumicunata—Cristo ricuchin paipaj espíritupaj cuerpota Jaredpaj huauquiman—Maijan shuj alipacha yachaita charij na jarcan velomanda—Yalichinacuna cushca can Jareditacunapaj tandachishpa quilcashcacunata michaman llujshi ushachun.

Éter 4

Moroni mandai tucushca can sellachun Jaredpaj huauqui quilcashcacunata—Caicuna na achil ricuchishca canga imaura runacuna Jaredpaj huauqui laya feta charingacaman—Cristo mandan runacunata paipaj shimicunapi crichun maijan paipaj discípulocunata—Runacuna mandai tucushca can arrepentirichun, crichun quishpiringapa villaicunata, quishpirichunbash.

Éter 5

Quimsa testigocuna, ruraillatapash shayaringa shuj testigo laya Mormónpaj Quilcashcapaj ciertopachamanda.

Éter 6

Jaredita yacupi huanbujcuna huairacunahuan tangashca can cushapacha nishca alpaman—Llactapuracuna Apunchijta alaban paipaj alicaimanda—Oríah ajllashca can jatun mandaj cachun—Jared, paipaj huauquipash huañun.

Éter 7

Oríah reinan rectitudpi—Shulepaj, Cohorpaj shinallata reinocuna shayarishca can, ushaita shuhuangapa, macanajui chaupipi—Achil Villachijcuna na alicachin llactapurapaj na ali ruraicunata, yanga dioscunata cungurinacunata, maijanguna jipaman arrepentirin.

Éter 8

Tiarca macanajuicuna, randimanda plituricuna reinomanda—Akish ruran shuj juramentoshca pacalla tandanajunacuna jatun mandajta huañuchingapa—Pacalla tandanajushcacuna ayapaj can, chaimanda catin jatun llactacunapaj tucuripi—Moderno Gentilcunata tigrashpa yarichin pacalla tandanajushcacunapaj contra cai mascanga libertad tucuchingapa tucui alpacunapaj, llactacuna, jatun llactacuna.

Éter 9

Reino yalin shujmanda cutishujman cati aillucunahuan, pacalla ruraihuan, huañuchihuanbash—Emer ricurca Ali Ruranapaj Churita—Tauca achil villachijcuna yachachin arrepentimientota—Shuj ninan yarjai, venenosa culebracuna llactapuracunata llaquichin.

Éter 10

Shuj jatun mandajta catin cutishuj—Huaquin jatun mandajcuna ali rurajcuna can; cutishujcuna na ali rurajcuna—Imaura ali rurai mishan, llactapuracuna achilyachishca can Apunchij ali mirachinbash.

Éter 11

Macanajuicuna, ninanda fiñarishpa rimarinacuna, na ali ruraicuna mishan Jareditacunapaj causaita—Achil villachijcuna yachachin Jareditacunapaj tucuilla tucurinata imashpapash paicuna arrepentirijllapi na—Llactapuracuna achil villachijcunapaj shimicunata na cazun.

Éter 12

Achil villachij Éter llactapuracunata cutin yarichin Diospi crichun—Moroni parlan juyailla ricurinacunata, juyaillapachacunatapash fehuan rurashca can—Fe ricuchun saquirca Cristota Jaredpaj huauquiman—Apunchij cun runacunaman irquicanata paicuna humildecuna cachun—Jaredpaj huauqui fehuan Zerín Urcuta anchuchirca—Fe, shuyai, caridad minishtirishcacuna can quishpiringapa—Moroni Jesústa ñavi ñavi ricurca.

Éter 13

Éter parlan shuj Mushuj Jerusalénmanda shayachishca cagrijta Américapi Josépaj cati aillucunahuan—Pai achil villan, llujchishpa cachashca can, Jareditacunapaj historiata quilcan, ñaupashpa villan Jareditacunapaj tucurita—Macanajuicuna ninanda millayan tucui alpapi.

Éter 14

Llactapuracunapaj na ali ruraicuna shuj ninan llaquita alpa jahuaman apamun—Coriántumr macanajuiman yaicun Gileadpaj contra, jipaman Lib, jipaman Shiz—Yahuar, huañuchishpa tucuchinapash alpata quilpan.

Éter 15

Millones Jareditacuna macanajuipi huañun—Shiz, Coriántumrpash tandachin tucui llactapuracunata huañunapacha macanajuiman—Apunchijpaj Espíritu paicunahuan macanajuita saquin—Jaredita jatun llacta tucuilla tucurin—Coriántumrlla causan.

Moroni






Moroni 1

Moroni quilcan Lamanitacunapaj alicachun—Huañuchin maijan Nefitacuna Cristota na negajpi. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 2

Jesús curca chunga ishcai Nefita discípulocunaman ushaita Espíritu Santopaj donda cungapa. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 3

Éldercuna ordenan presbíterocunata, maestrocunatapash maquicunata churashpa: Nara C.H. 401–421

Moroni 4

Imashna éldercuna, presbíterocunapash sacramental tandata achilyachinata villashca can. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 5

Imashna sacramental vinota achilyachinata villashca can. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 6

Arrepentirishca genticuna bautizashcacuna can, iglesiapi ali rijsirishcacunapash—Iglesia catijcuna maijan arrepentirin perdonashcacuna can—Tandanajuicuna apashca can Espíritu Santopaj ushaihuan. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 7

Shuj cumbidai cushca can Apunchijpaj samanaman yaicuchun—Achil mañai ciertopacha munaihuan—Cristopaj Espíritu runacunaman na alimanda alita ajllachun saquin—Satanás runacuna Cristota negachun munan na alita rurachunbash—Achil villachijcuna yachachin Cristopaj shamunata—Fehuan, juyailla ruraita ricuchinacuna rurashca can, ángelcuna yachachipash—Runacuna shuyana mana tucurina causaita, caridadman quimirinapash. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 8

Uchilla huahuacunapaj bautismo shuj ninan na ali millanayai can—Uchilla huahuacuna Cristopi causajcuna can, Shujpa Juchamanda Huañunamanda—Fe, arrepentimiento, mansedumbre, shungumanda humildad, chasquishpa Espíritu Santota, tucurinacaman catirianapash quishpirinaman apan. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 9

Nefitacunapash, Lamanitacunapash ninanda huaglishcacuna can—Paicuna ninanda macan, huañuchinbash caishuta chaishuta—Mormón achil mañan ninan juyai, alicaipash Moronipaj jahuapi samachun mana tucurinacaman. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Moroni 10

Mormónpaj Quilcashcapaj testimoniota chasquina Espíritu Santopaj ushaihuan—Espíritupaj dongunata cushca can fielcunaman—Espiritual don punllan punllan cumban fe—Moronipaj shimicuna parlan alpamanda—Cristopaman shamuichi, paipi alipacha caichi, cangunapaj almacunata achilyachichipash. Nara C.H. 421.

Mormónpaj Quilcashcapa Maipi Cajta Ricuchina

Mormónpaj Quilcashca, tucui jahuapi, testifican Jesucristopaj divinidadmanda, charinbash Jesucristopaj achil yachajunapaj yachajuicunatapash. Cati yachachinacuna, ricuchinata cun llactapuracunaman, pushtucunaman, yachachinacuna, Mormónpaj Quilcashcamanda ricuchicuna.
eight 0:
[center][font_size=26]Mormónpaj Quilcashca[/font_size][/center]

Callarij Testimoniocunapash






portada


Mormónpaj Quilcashcapaj portada

Chaimanda, cai can Nefipaj llactapuracunapaj quilcashcamanda shuj ashallayachishca, Lamanitacunapapash—Quilcashca Lamanitacunapa, picuna can Israelpaj huasipaj puchucuna; Judíocunapapash, Gentilcunamanbash—Quilcashca rurachunbacha saquishcapaj ñanmanda, achil villachinapaj, achil ricuchinapajpash espírituhuan—Quilcashca, sellashcapash, pacashcapash Apunchijpaj munaipa, paicuna ama tucurichun—Llujshishpa Diospaj don ushaihuanbash caimanda shuj shimiman tigrachingapa—Sellashca Moronipaj maquihuan, pacashcapash Apunchijpaj munaipa, llujshichun punlla chayajpi Gentilcunamanda—Shuj tigrachingapa Diospaj ushaihuan.

Ima Cajta Villachi

Mormónpaj Quilcashca can achil quilcashcapaj shuj volumen Biblia laya. Cai can shuj tandachishpa quilcashca Diospaj comunicación Américapi punda causajcunahuan, charinbash tucui mana tucurina quishpiringapa villaicunata.

Ashayachishpa Villachi Mormónpaj Quilcashcamanda

Mormónpaj Quilcashca can shuj achil tandachishpa quilcashca punda Américapi llactapuracunamanda, quilcashca carca jirru fangacunapi. Cai quilcashcapi parlashca can chuscu jirru fangacunamanda:

Ricunacuna



1 Nefi






1 Nefi 1

Nefi paipa llacta tandachishpa quilcashcacunata callarin—Lehi achil muscuipi ricun shuj nina pilarta shuj achil villana quilcashcamanda liin—Pai Diosta alicachin, Mesías shamunata villan, Jerusalén tucurinatapash achil villachin—Pai Judíocunahuan na ricunayachishpa cati tucurca. Nara 600 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 2

Lehipa aillucunata jichushca pambaman Puca Jatun Mama Cochata ladota pushan—Paicunapaj charishcacunata saquin—Lehi Apunchijman shuj sacrificiota cun paipaj churicunaman rurachunbacha saquishcacunata alichichun yachachinbash—Lamán Lemuelpash paicunapaj taitata huashariman—Nefi cazuj can fehuan achil mañan; Apunchijca paihuan parlan, pai ajllai tucun paipaj huauquicunata mandachun. Nara 600 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 3

Lehipaj churicuna Jerusalénman tigran bronce jirru fangacunata apamungapa—Labán jirru fangacunata na cungapa munan—Nefi paipa huauquicunata cutin yarichin shinlliyachinbash—Labán paicunapaj charishcacunata shuhuan paicunata huañuchingapa yuyan—Lamán, Lemuel, Nefita, Samdapash huajtan shuj ángelhuanmi rimaitucun. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 4

Nefi Labánda huañuchin Apunchij mandaimanda jipaman bronce jirru fangacunata umachishpa japin—Zoram ajllan Lehipaj aillucunahuan jichushca pambapi tandanajungapa. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 5

Saríah Lehita na alicachirca—Ishcandi cushijun paicunapaj churicuna tigramujpi—Paicuna sacrificiocunata cun—Bronce jirru fangacuna Moiséspaj achil villachijcunapaj quilcashcacunata charirca—Jirru fangacuna Lehica Josémanda shamuj cajta rijsichirca—Lehi paipaj cati aillucunamanda achil villachirca jirru fangacunata alchishpa charinatapash. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 6

Nefi Diospaj cuzascunata quilcan—Nefipaj munai can runacunata yarichina Abrahampaj Diospaman shamushpa quishpirishca cachun. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 7

Lehipaj churicuna Jerusalénman tigran Ismaelta paipaj huasipuracunatapash paicunahuan tandanajuchun ringapa cumbidan—Lamán shujcunahuanbash na cazun—Nefi paipa huauquicunata Apunchijpi feta charinata cutin yarichin—Paicuna paita cabiacunahuan huatan tucuchingapa munan—Fe ushaimanda cacharirin—Paipaj huauquicuna perdónda mañan—Lehi paipaj cumbajcunahuan sacrificiota cun ofrendacunatapash rupachin. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 8

Lehi shuj achil muscuita ricun causanamanda quiruta—Pai fucushcata micun shinallata paipaj aillu rurachun munan—Shuj hierro barrata, shuj quichiji angostopash chaquiñanda ricun, yanalla llujshiju samai runacunata pillun—Saríah, Nefi, Sam fucushcata micun, ashtahuangari Lamán, Lemuel na munan. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 9

Nefi ishcai tandachishca quilcashcacunata ruran—Shuj shujlla Nefipaj jirru fangacunata shutichishca can—Shujta yali jatun jirru fangacunaca shuj yangalla historia quilcashcata charin; shujta yali uchillapi achil cuzascunatalla charin. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 10

Lehi jipacanata nin Judíocuna Babiloniacunamanda huatai tucushcashna apai tucushca canga—Pai Judíocunamanda shuj Mesías, shuj Jatun Quishpichij, shuj Jatun Causachij shamunata nin—Lehi ninbash shuj shamunata pimi Diospaj llamaguta bautizanga—Lehi ninbash Mesíaspa huañuita causarinatapash—Pai shuj olivo quiruhuan Israelpaj shicanyaita tandanajuitapash parijashpa ricuchin—Nefi Diospaj churimanda parlan, Espíritu Santopaj donmanda, ali rurana minishtirishcamandapash. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 11

Nefi Apunchijpaj Espírituta ricun causana quirutapash shuj achil muscuipi ricuchishca can—Diospaj Churipaj mamata ricun Diospaj achil juyaita yachajun—Pai ricun bautismota, achil yachachinata, Diospaj Llamagu chacatarinatapash—Pai ricunbash Llamagupaj chunga ishcai Apóstolcunapaj achil cayachishca achil yachachinatapash. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 12

Nefi cushapacha nishca alpata achil muscuipi ricun; ali ruranacuna, na ali ruraicuna, chaipi causajcunapaj urmaicuna; Diospaj Llamagu paicunapaman shamuita; imashna chunga ishcai Discípulocuna chunga ishcai Apóstolcunapash Israelta ricushpa chasquichinga; millanayai mapalla cai picunami na crishpa asha asha chingarina. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 13

Nefi ricun achil muscuipi ayapaj iglesiata Gentilcunapi tiarin, Américata rijsin causangapa callarin, Bibliamanda punchalla juyaillapash tauca pushtucuna chingan, chaimanda Gentilcunapaj apostasía cai, quishpiringapa villaicuna cutinlla apamun, tucurimui punllapi achil quilcashcacuna ricurimui, Siónpaj shayari. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 14

Shuj ángel Nefiman villan Gentilcunapi achil yachishcacuna llaquichicunapash urmanata—Ishcai iglesiacunalla tian: Diospaj Llamagupaj Iglesia ayapaj iglesiapash—Diospaj santocuna tucui jatun llactacunapi na ricunayachishpa cati tucun jatun millanayai iglesiamanda—Apóstol Juan cai pacha tucurinamanda quilcanga. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 15

Lehipaj cati aillucuna chasquingapa can quishpiringapa villaicunata Gentilcunamanda tucurimui punllacunapi—Israelpaj tandanajuica shuj olivo quirupi parijashpa ricuchishca can chaipipacha viñashca malquicuna cutin quimichishpa churashca canga—Nefi achil muscuipi causana quirumanda ima cajta nin Diospaj alicaita parlan shicanyashpa na ali rurajcunata ali rurajcunamanda. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 16

Na alita rurajcunaca ciertotaca shinlli cajta tarin—Lehipaj churicuna Ismaelpaj ushicunahuan cazaran—Liahona ñanda rinata ricuchin jichushca pambapi—Apunchijpaj villaicuna huaquinbi huaquinbi Liahonapi quilcashca can—Ismael huañun; paipaj aillucuna huashariman llaquicunamanda. Nara 600–592 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 17

Nefi shuj barcota rurachun mandai tucushca can—Paipaj huauquicuna paita chimbapuran—Paicunata cutin yarichin tigrashpa parlashpa imashna cashcacunata Diospaj tratocuna Israelhuan—Nefi Diospaj ushaihuan jundashca can—Paita ama tacarichun paipaj huauquicuna na saquishcacuna can, ama paicunara anguyanman shuj chaquishca virushna. Nara 592–591 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 18

Barcota rurai tucuchishca can—Jacobpaj Josépaj nacerimuicunata rimashca can—Tandanajushca cumbacuna cushapacha nishca alpaman yacuta rin—Ismaelpaj churicuna paicunapaj huarmicunapash yapata cushijuiman pitapash na cazunamambash quimirin—Nefi huatashca can, barcoca shuj manllanayai ninan huairahuan huashaman tigrachin—Nefi cachari tucushca can paipaj achil mañaimanda ninan tamia saquirin—Runacuna cushapacha nishca alpaman chayamun. Nara 591–589 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 19

Nefi jirru fangacunata ruran paipaj runacunapaj imashna cashcata tandachishca quilcan—Lehi Jerusalénmanda llujshimushca jipa Israelpaj Diosca shamugrin sujta patsaj huatacunapi—Paipaj llaquiricunata chacatarinatapash Nefi nin—Judíocuna millanayai calpachi tucushca canga tucurimui punllacunacaman, Apunchijpaman paicuna imaura tigramungacaman. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 20

Apunchijca paipaj munaicunata Israelman achil yachaj chayachin—Israel ajllai tucushca can llaqui jurnopi Babiloniamanda llujshishca can—Isaías 48-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 21

Mesías Gentilcunapa shuj micha canga vichashcacunata cacharinga—Israel tandanajunga ushaihuan tucuri punllapi—Jatun mandajcuna paicunapaj viñachij taitacunashna canga—Isaías 49-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

1 Nefi 22

Israel tucui alpa jahualla chajchui tucushca canga—Gentilcuna Israelman chuchuchinga micunata carangapash quishpiringapa villaicunahuan tucuri punllapi—Israel tandachishca canga quishpiringapash, na alita rurajcuna rupanga jupashna—Ayapaj reinoca tucuchishca canga, Satanás huatashca canga. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi






2 Nefi 1

Lehi shuj libre causana pambamanda achil villan—Paipaj cati aillucuna shitashca chugrichishcapash canga paicuna Israelpaj Achilta na cazujpica—Paipaj churicunata cutin yarichin ali ruranapaj macanajungapashna churajunacunata churajuchun. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 2

Jatun Causachinaca Achil Mesías-huan shamun—Ajllangapaj libertad (ñucanchillata ajllana) minishtishca can tiangapa mirangapapash—Adán urmarca runacuna tiachun—Runacuna libre can ajllangapa libertadta mana tucurina causaitapash. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 3

Egiptopi José ricurca Nefitacunata achil muscuipi—Pai José Smithmanda achil villachirca, tucuri punllapaj vidente; Moisésmanda, pimi Israelta cacharichinga; Mormónpaj Quilcashca ricurimunamanda. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 4

Lehi yachachin achilyachinbash paipa cati aillucunata—Pai huañun pambaitucun—Nefi alicachin Diospaj alicaita—Nefi ima punllapash Apunchijpi shunguta churashpa shuyan na tucurinacaman. Nara 588–570 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 5

Nefitacuna paicunamandallata Lamanitacunamanda shicanyachi tucurca, Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacunata Alichin, shuj Achil Huasita ruran—Na crijmanda, Lamanitacuna Apunchijpaj ñaupamanda anchuchi tucun, llaquichitucun, paicunamanda Nefitacuna asti tucunga. Nara 588–559 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 6

Jacob Judíocuna imashna causashcata parlan: huatai tucushcashna tigramuitapash Babiloniamanda; Israelpaj Achil achil yachachishcamanda chacatarishca mandapash; Gentilcunamanda ayudata chasquishca; Judíocunapaj cutinlla apamuna tucurimui punllacunapi imaura paicuna Mesíaspi crijpi. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 7

Isaías Mesías laya parlan—Mesíasca ali yachajushca shimirimaita charinga—Pai huashata astijcunaman saquinga—Pai na pandachishca cangachu—Isaías 50-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 8

Tucuri punllacunapi, Apunchijca Siónda cushichinga Israelta tandachinga—Jatun causachishcacunaca Siónman shamunga jatun cushijui chaupipi—Isaías 51-huan parijashpa ricui 52:1–2-huanbash. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 9

Judíocuna tandanajushca canga tucui paicunapaj cushapacha nishca alpacunapi—Shujpa juchacunamanda huañunaca runacunata quishpichin Urmashcamanda—Huañushcacunapaj cuerpocuna pambashca pushtumanda llujshimunga, paicunapaj espíritucuna ucu pachamanda paraísomandapash—Paicuna ricushpa chasquichishca canga—Shujpa juchacunamanda huañuna huañuimanda quishpichinga, ucu pachamanda, ayamanda na tucurinata chari llaqui apanamandapash—Ali rurajcunaca quishpichishcacuna canga Diospaj reinopi—Juchacunamanda castigocunata yachaj chayachishca canga—Israelpaj Achil punguta cuidaj canga. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 10

Judíocuna paicunapaj Diosta cruzpi chacatanga—Paicuna caiman chaiman shitai tucushca canga imaura paipi cri callaringacaman—América shuj libre causana pamba canga maipi ni maijan jatun mandaj mandanga—Ali tucuichi Dios-huan chasquichipash jatun quishpirinata paipaj ninan juyaimanda. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 11

Jacob paipaj Jatun Causachijta ricurca—Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacuna Cristota imacanata ricuchin pai shamunata tigrai ricuchin. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 12

Isaías Achil Huasita tucurina punllapi ricun, Israelpaj tandanajuita, ricushpa chasquichina sumaj cai milenariotapash—Jariyaj na alita rurajcunapash cati shamuipi humillarin—Isaías 2-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 13

Judá Jerusalénpash castigai tucushca canga paicunapaj na cazuimanda—Apunchijca paipaj llactapuracunata randi shayarin ricushpa chasquichinbash—Siónba ushicuna llaquichishcacuna llaqui yalichishcacuna can paicunapaj mundano cuzascunamanda—Isaías 3-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 14

Sión paipaj ushicunapash jatun causachishca canga maillarishcapash milenario punllapi—Isaías 4-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 15

Apunchijpaj uvas chagra (Israel) pipash illa jichushca tigranga, paipaj llactapuracuna caiman chaiman shitai tucushca canga—Llaquicuna paicunapaman shamunga paicunapaj apóstata caiman chaiman shitai tucushca canapash—Apunchijca vichai alsanga shuj bandera layata Israelta tandachingapash—Isaías 5-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 16

Isaías Apunchijta ricun—Isaíaspaj juchacuna perdonashcacuna can—Pai cayashca can achil villachingapa—Achil villachin Cristo yachachishcacunata Judíocuna na cazun—Shuj puchushca tigramunga—Isaías 6-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 17

Efraín Siriapash Judáhuan macanajun—Cristo nacirishca canga jarihuan na tacarishca cuitsagumanda—Isaías 7-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 18

Cristo shuj urmachij rumishna canga shuj nitijachij rumipash—Apunchijta mascaichi, brujocunapica na—Tigrarichi catichunbacha saquishcacunaman testimoniocunamanbash yachajuita chasquingapa—Isaías 8-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 19

Isaías Mesías laya parlan—Yanallapi llactapuracuna shuj punchapamba michata ricunga—Ñucanchipi shuj huahuagu nacirin—Sumaj Causaipaj Príncipe canga Davidpaj jatun tiarinapi pushanga—Isaías 9-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 20

Asiriapaj tucuchinaca shuj ricuchi can na alita rurajcunapaj tucuchinata Cati Shamuipi—Ashalla llactapuracuna saquirishca canga Apunchij cutin shamushca jipa—Jacobmanda puchushcacuna chai punllapi tigramunga—Isaías 10-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 21

Isaípaj troncomanda vara (Cristo) ali ruranapi ricushpa chasquichinga—Mileniopi Diospaj yachajuicuna alpata quilpanga—Apunchijca shuj banderata vichai alsanga Israelta tandachingapash—Isaías 11-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 22

Tucui runacuna milenio punllapica Apunchijta alabanga—Pai paicunahuan causanga—Isaías 12-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 23

Babiloniapaj tucuchina Cati Shamuipi tucuchinata shuj ricuchi can—Caica canga fiñaipaj venganzapajpash punlla—Babilonia (cai pacha) na tucurinacaman urmanga—Isaías 13-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 24

Israel tandanajushca canga samana milenariomanda cushijunga—Lucifer jahua pachamanda na cazujpi shitashca carca—Israel Babiloniata (cai pacha) mishanga—Isaías 14-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 25

Nefi cushijun na pandaipi—Isaíaspaj achil villashcacuna tucuri punllacunapi yuyaipi chasquinga—Judíocuna Babiloniamanda tigramunga, Mesíasta cruzpi chacatanga, caiman chaiman shitai tucushca llaquichi tucushcapash canga—Paicuna cutinlla apamui tucushca canga imaura paicuna Mesíaspi crijpi—Pai callari shamunga sujta patsaj huatacuna Lehi Jerusalénda saquishca jipa—Nefitacuna Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacunata alichin Cristopi crin, pimi Israelpaj Achil. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 26

Cristo Nefitacunata achil yachachinga—Nefi paipaj llactapurapaj tucuchinata jipacanata ricun—Paicuna alpamanda parlanga—Gentilcuna yanga iglesiacunata ruranga pacalla tandanajunacunatapash—Apunchijca runacunata supercheríacunata na saquin rurachun. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 27

Yanalla apostasíapash cai alpata quilpanga tucuri punllacunapi—Mormónpaj quilcashca michaman llujshinga—Quimsa ricujcuna quilcashcamanda testificanga—Ninan yachajushca runa ninga na lii ushani sellashca quilcashcata—Apunchijca shuj juyaillapacha rurai shuj juyailla ricurinatapash ruranga—Isaías 29-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 28

Tauca llulla iglesiacuna tucuri punllacunapi shayachishca canga—Paicuna yachachinga llulla, yanga, juizu illa yachajuicunata—Apostasía ashtacapacha tianga llulla yachachijcunamanda—Aya runacunapaj shungucunata ninanda millayachinga—Pai yachachinga tucui laya llulla yachajuicunata. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 29

Tauca Gentilcuna Mormónpaj Quilcashcata na chasquinga—Paicuna ninga, Ñucanchi na ashtahuan Bibliata minishtinchichu—Apunchij tauca jatun llactacunata parlan—Pai ricushpa chasquichinga cai pachata quilcashcacunamanda caicunaca quilcashca canga. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 30

Achil tigrarishca Gentilcuna convenio llactapuracunahuan yupashca canga—Tauca Lamanitacuna Judíocunapash achil shimicunapi cringa munanayaicunapash canga—Israel cutinlla apamushca canga na alita rurajcunaca tucuchishca canga. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 31

Nefi nin imashpa Cristo bautizarishca cashcamanda—Runacuna Cristota catinapacha, bautizarishca cana, Espíritu Santota chasquina, tucurinacaman catiriashpaca quishpirishca cangapa—Arrepentimiento bautismopash pungu can quichiji angostopash chaquiñanman pushan—Mana tucurina causai shamun picunami bautismo jipa rurachunbacha saquishcacunata alichin. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 32

Ángelcuna parlan Espíritu Santopaj ushaihuan—Runacuna achil mañanapacha Espíritu Santomanda yachajuita chasquingapa. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

2 Nefi 33

Nefipaj shimicuna ciertopacha can—Cristomanda testifican—Cristopi crijcunaca Nefipaj shimicunapi cringa, chaicuna ricuchishca canga shuj testimonioshna ricushpa chasquichina jatun shayarina ñaupapi. Nara 559–545 C.Ñ.

Jacob






Jacob 1

Jacob Josépash crichingapa munan runacunata Cristopi crichun paipaj rurachunbacha saquishcacunata alichichunbash—Nefi huañun—Na alita ruraicuna Nefitacunapi miran. Nara 544–421 C.Ñ.

Jacob 2

Jacob valishca charishcacunata juyaita na alicachin, jariyai, castidad illatapash—Runacuna mascai ushan valishca charinacunata shujcunata ayudangapa—Jacob na alicachin na mandashca taucahuan cazarashpa catinata—Apunchijca cushijun huarmicunapaj castidadpi. Nara 544–421 C.Ñ.

Jacob 3

Shungupi mapa illacunaca ali cana Diospaj shimita chasquin—Lamanitacunapaj ali ruraicunaca Nefitacunapata yalishca can—Jacob cayachin ama urmachun fornicaciónpi, mapata ruraicuna, shuj juchacunapipash. Nara 544–421 C.Ñ.

Jacob 4

Tucui achil villachijcuna Taitata Cristopaj shutipi adorarca—Abraham Isaacta achil cushca ricuchij laya carca Diosta paipaj Shujlla Churitapash—Runacuna Dios-huan ali tucunga shujpa juchacunamanda huañunamanda—Judíocuna huasi shayachina rumita na cazunga. Nara 544–421 C.Ñ.

Jacob 5

Jacob nin Zenóspaj shimicunata tarpushca olivo yuracunamanda, sacha olivo quirucunamandapash—Caicuna can Israelpaj Gentilcunamandapash shuj rijcha—Israelpaj shicanyachina tandanajuitapash ricuchishca can—Nefitacunata Lamanitacunatapash tucuilla Israelpaj huasimandapash ricujunipacha yashca carca—Gentilcuna quimichishpa churashca canga Israelpi—Tucuripi uvas chagra rupachishca canga. Nara 544–421 C.Ñ.

Jacob 6

Apunchijca Israelta tigrachinga tucuri punllacunapi—Cai pacha ninahuan rupachishca canga—Runacuna Cristota catinapacha can ama nina azufrepash cochata ricungapa. Nara 544–421 C.Ñ.

Jacob 7

Sherem Cristota na nin, Jacobhuan fiñarin, shuj señalta ricuchichu mañan, Diosmanda chugrichi tucushca can—Tucui Achil Villachijcuna parlashca can Cristomanda pai shujpa juchacunamanda huañunamandapash—Nefitacuna paicunapaj causaita yalishca yanga purijcunashna, llaqui yalipi nacirishca Lamanitacunahuan na ricunayachi tucushcapash. Nara 544–421 C.Ñ.

Enós

Enós achil mañan tucui ushaihuan paipaj juchacunata anchuchinata chasquin—Apunchijpaj shimi paipaj yuyaiman shamurca, quishpirinata cushapacha nishpa Lamanitacunaman shuj shamuj punllapi—Nefitacuna Lamanitacunata tigrachingapa munan—Enós cushijun paipaj Jatun Causachijpi. Nara 420 C.Ñ.

Jarom

Nefitacuna Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacunata alichin, Cristopaj shamunata ñaupaman ricun, pambapi ali miranbash—Tauca achil villachijcuna trabajan llactapuracuna ciertopacha ñanbi alichingapa. Nara 399–361 C.Ñ.

Omni

Omni, Amarón, Quemis, Abinadom Amalekípash, paicuna shujllangaman, quilcashpa catin—Mosíah Zarahemla llactapuracunata yachaj chayan, picuna Jerusalénmanda shamushca carca Sedequíaspaj punllacunapi—Mosíah paicunapa jatun mandaj tucuchun cayai tucurca—Mulekpaj cati aillucuna Coriántumrda Jareditacunapaj ña tucuri runa Zarahemlapi tuparca—Jatun mandaj Benjamín Mosíahta catishpa mandan—Runacuna paicunapaj almacunata cuna can Cristoman shuj ofrendatashna. Nara 323–130 C.Ñ.

Mormónpaj Shimicuna

Mormón Nefipaj shujta yali jatun jirru fangacunata tandachishcata ruran—Uchilla jirru fangacunata cutishuj jirru fangacunahuan churan—Jatun mandaj Benjamín sumaj causaita alpapi churan. Nara C.H. 385.

Mosíah






Mosíah 1

Jatun mandaj Benjamín yachachin paipaj churicunaman paicunapaj taitacunapaj shimirimaicunata achil villachicunatapash—Paicunapaj Diosta crishpa causaita, ali yachajushpa causashcacuna alchishpa charishca cashca tandachishpa quilcashcacuna tauca jirru fangacunapi alichishca caimanda—Mosíah jatun mandaj cachun ajllashca can tandachishca quilcashcacunata ali alichishpa charichunbash cutishuj cuzascunapash. Nara 130–124 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 2

Jatun mandaj Benjamín paipaj llactapuracunaman parlan—Paipaj reinadopaj pactacanamanda, alicanamanda, espiritualidadmandapash villan—Paicunapaj Jahua Pacha Achil jatun mandajta sirvichun mandan—Picunapash Diosta na cazujcunaca ninan llaquita yalinga na huañushpa rupajuj ninashna. Nara 124 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 3

Jatun mandaj Benjamín catin paipaj parlaicunahuan—Tucui Ushaita Charij Apunchij runacunamanda achil yachachinga alpahuan rurashca tabernáculopi—Shujllangaman porocunamanda yahuar shutunga cai pachapaj juchacunamanda huañujpi—Paipaj shutimandallami jatun quishpirinaca shamunga—Runacuna natural runamanda cachariri ushan Santocunaman tigranbash Shujpa Juchacunamanda Huañunamanda—Na alita rurajcunapaj llaqui apaica shuj nina azufrepash cocha laya canga. Nara 124 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 4

Jatun mandaj Benjamín catin paipaj parlaicunahuan—Quishpirina shamun shujpa juchacunamanda huañuimanda—Diospi crina quishpirishca cangapa—Mana cacharina cangunapaj juchacunata anchuchinata shinllicaihuan—Cangunapaj minishtirishcapachata huajchacunaman carai—Tucui cuzascunata yachaihuan rurai alipi churashpapash. Nara 124 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 5

Santocuna tigran cangapa Cristopaj churicuna ushicunapash femanda—Paicuna cayashca can Cristopaj shutipi—Jatun mandaj Benjamín cutin yarichin na shaijujcuna cachun ali ruraicunapi na shujman tigrajcuna cachun. Nara 124 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 6

Jatun mandaj Benjamín tandachishpa quilcan llactapuracunapaj shuticunata sacerdotecunatapash cayan yachachichun—Mosíah reinan ali jatun mandajshna. Nara 124–121 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 7

Ammón tarin Lehi-Nefi alpata maipi Limhi jatun mandaj can—Limhipaj llactapuracuna Lamanitacunahuan huatai tucushcashnapi can—Limhi paicunapaj causashcacunata parlan—Achil villachij (Abinadí) testificashca carca Cristo can Dios tucui cuzascunapaj Taita—Picunami mapallata tarpun acapanata chasquinga, picunami Apunchijpi confianzata churan cacharichishca canga. Nara 121 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 8

Ammón yachachin Limhipaj llactapuracunata—Pai yachajun Jareditacunapaj ishcai chunga chuscu jirru fangacunamanda—Punda tandachishpa quilcashcacuna shuj shimirimaiman tigrachishca can videntemanda. Vidente donda charijta Jatun yalishca don na tianllu. Nara 121 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 9

Zeniff pushan shuj tandanajushcata Zarahemlamanda Lehi-Nefipaj alpata japingapa—Lamanita jatun mandaj paicunata saquin alpata chasquichun—Lamanitacunahuan Zeniffpaj llactapuracunahuan macanajui tian. Nara 200–187 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 10

Jatun mandaj Lamán huañun—Paipaj llactapuracuna sacha runacuna imamandapash millayaicuna can, yanga punda taitacunapaj yachachishcacunata crin—Zeniff paipaj llactapuracunapash Lamanitacunata mishan. Nara 187–160 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 11

Jatun mandaj Noé na ali ruraicunapi mandan—Paicunapaj huarmicunahuan chaishu huarmicunahuan huagli causaicunata munan—Abinadí achil villachin llactapuracuna huatai tucushcashnaman apashca canga—Jatun mandaj Noé Abinadípa causaita quichungapa munashca carca. Nara 160–150 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 12

Abinadí cárcelpi vichai tucushca can llactapuracuna tucurinata, jatun mandaj Noé huañunatapash achil villachishcamanda—Llulla sacerdotecuna achil quilcashcacunapi shimicunata nin Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacunata alichinajunshnalla—Abinadí yachachi callarin chunga rurachunbacha saquishcacunamanda. Nara 148 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 13

Abinadí huacaichishca can Diospaj ushaihuan—Pai yachachin Chunga rurachunbacha saquishcacunata—Quishpirinaca Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacunamandalla na shamunllu—Dios paimandallata shujpa juchacunamanda huañunga paipaj llactapuracunata jatun causachingapash. Nara 148 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 14

Isaías Mesías laya parlan—Mesíaspaj humillación llaquiricunamandapash parlashca can—Paica almata ofrendata ruran juchacunamanda, na ali rurajcunamanda shayarin—Isaías 53-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara 148 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 15

Imashnata Cristo caita ushan ishcandi Taitapash Churipash—Pai shayaringa paipaj llactapuracunapaj na alita ruraicunatapash apan—Paicuna, tucui achil villachijcunapash paipaj cati aillucuna can—Pai Cutin Causarita yalichun apamun—Uchilla huahuacuna mana tucurina causaita charin. Nara 148 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 16

Dios runacunata jatun causachin, paicunapaj chingashca, urmashca canamanda—Aicha cajcuna shinallata cashpa catin jatun causachina na tiashcashna—Cristo apamun yalichun cutin causarinata na tucurina causaiman nacashpaca na tucurina condenaciónman. Nara 148 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 17

Alma crin Abinadípaj shimicunata quilcanbash—Abinadí ninahuan huañuita charin—Pai achil villachin paipaj huañuchijcunapaj unguimanda, ninahuan huañugrimandapash. Nara 148 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 18

Alma pacalla yachachin—Pai aliguta yachachin bautismopaj conveniomanda, Mormón yacucunapi bautizan—Cristopaj Iglesiata shayachin, sacerdotecunatapash ordenan—Paicunallata causangapa minishtishcacunata charin, llactapuracunata yachachin—Alma paipaj llactapuracunahuan jatun mandaj Noémanda pacajushpa calpan jichushca pambaman. Nara 147–145 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 19

Gedeón jatun mandaj Noéta huañuchingapa munan—Lamanitacuna alpata mishan—Jatun mandaj Noé ninahuan huañuita charin—Limhi mandan tributota chasquij monarca laya. Nara 145–121 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 20

Lamanitacunapaj huaquin ushicuna shuhuashpa apai tucun Noépaj sacerdotecunahuan—Lamanitacuna macanajun Limhi, paipaj llactapuracunahuan—Lamanita macanajuj runacuna huashaman tigrachi tucushca can, sumaj causaita charinbash. Nara 145–123 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 21

Lamanitacuna chugrichin, mishambash Limhipaj llactapuracunata—Ammónta tupan Limhipaj llactapuracuna crijcuna can—Ammónman ishcai chunga chuscu Jaredita jirru fangacunamanda villan. Nara 122–121 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 22

Llactapuracunamanda imatalla ruranacunata ricun Lamanitacunapaj huatai tucushcashnamanda llujshishpa ringapa—Lamanitacunata machachin—Llactapuracuna llujshishpa rin, Zarahemlaman tigramun, Jatun Mandaj Mosíahpaman mandashcaman curin. Nara 121–120 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 23

Alma jatun mandaj cangapa na nin—Sumo sacerdote laya shujcunata sirvin—Apunchij paipaj llactapuracunata castigan, Lamanitacuna Helam alpata mishan—Noé jatun mandajpaj na alita ruraj sacerdotecunapaj ñaupaj, Amulón, monarca Lamanitapaj munaiman curishpa mandan. Nara 145–121 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 24

Amulón Almata, paipaj llactapuracunatapash na ricunayachishpa catin—Achil mañajpica causaita quichungapa can—Apunchij paicunapaj quipicunata fangallayachin—Paicunata huatai tucushcashnamanda cacharichin, Zarahemlaman tigran. Nara 145–120 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 25

Zarahemlapi Mulekipaj cati aillucuna Nefitacunaman tigran—Almapaj, Zeniffpaj llactapuracunamanda yachaj chayan—Limhita, paipaj llactapuracunata Alma bautizan—Mosíah autorizan Almata Diospaj Iglesiata shayachichu. Nara 120 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 26

Na crijcuna tauca Iglesiata catijcunata juchaman pushan—Almaman mana tucurina causaita nishcapacha can—Picuna arrepentirin, bautizarishcacuna perdónda chasquin—Iglesiata catijcuna juchapi urmashcacuna, arrepentirishpa Almaman, Apunchijmanbash villajpi, Apunchij perdonanga; na shina cashpa Iglesiapaj llactapuracunahuan na yupai tucushca canga. Nara 120–100 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 27

Mosíah na saquin na ricunayachishpa catinata, tucuicuna igual canata churan—Alma viñaj, Mosíahpaj chuscu churicunahuan Iglesiata tucuchingapa munan—Shuj ángel ricurin, mandanbash paicunata saquichun na ali ñangunata purinata—Alma upaman tigran—Tucui runacuna quishpiringapa cutin nacirinapacha can—Alma, Mosíahpaj churicunahuan mushuj cushijunacuna yachachin. Nara 100–92 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 28

Mosíahpaj churicuna Lamanitacunaman yachachingapa rirca—Videntepaj ishcai rumicunahuan, Mosíah Jareditacunapaj jirru fangacunata shuj shimirimaiman tigrachin. Nara 92 C.Ñ.

Mosíah 29

Mosíah ricushpa chasquichijcunata ajllashca cachun munan jatun mandajpa randi—Na alita ruraj jatun mandajcuna paicunapaj llactapuracunata juchaman pushan—Alma viñaj runa ricushpa chasquichijcunapaj yalishca mandaj cachun ajllai tucushca can llactapuracunapaj shimi mañajpi—Iglesiapa Sumo sacerdotepash can—Alma Taita, Mosíahpash huañun. Nara 92–91 C.Ñ.

Alma






Alma 1

Nehor yanga yachajuicunata yachachin, shuj iglesiata shayachin, superchería sacerdotal callarin, Gedeónda huañuchin—Nehor paipaj huañuchicunamanda paipash huañuchishca can—Supercheríacuna, na ricunayachishpa catinacuna llactapuracunapi jicharin—Sacerdotecuna paicunallata causangapa minishtishcacunata charin, llactapuracuna huajchacunata ricun, Iglesia ali miran. Nara 91–88 C.Ñ.

Alma 2

Amlici jatun mandaj tucungapa munan, llactapuracunapaj shimihuan na munai tucushca can—Paipaj catijcuna jatun mandajta ruran—Amlicitacuna Nefitacunahuan macanajun, mishai tucushca can—Lamanitacuna, Amlicitacunapash tandachin macanajujcunata, mishai tucushca can—Alma Amlicita huañuchin. Nara 87 C.Ñ.

Alma 3

Amlicitacuna paicunamandallata marcata churarirca achil villachishca shimi nishcamanda—Lamanitacuna na cazuimanda llaquichi tucushcacuna carca—Runacuna llaquichinata paicunallata apamun—Nefitacuna cutishuj Lamanita macanajuj runacunata mishan. Nara 87–86 C.Ñ.

Alma 4

Alma huaranga huaranga catijcunata bautizan—Na ali ruraicuna Iglesiaman yaicun, Iglesiapaj mirashpa catina jarcarishca can—Nefíah ricushpa chasquichijcunata yalishpa mandaj ajllashca can—Alma, sumo sacerdote cashpa, achil yachachinapilla can. Nara 86–83 C.Ñ.

Alma 5

Quishpiringapa, runacuna arrepentirinapacha, rurachunbacha saquishcacunata alichina, cutin nacirina, paicunapaj churajunacunata maillarina Cristopaj yahuarhuan, humildecuna cana, jariyaicunata shujpa charishcacunata munaicunata anchuchina, ali ruraicunata rurana—Ali Michij paipaj llactapuracunata cayan—Pipash na ali ruraicunata rurajcunaca ayapaj huahuacuna can—Alma testifican paipaj yachachinacuna ciertopacha cajta, runacunata arrepentirichun mandan—Ali rurajcunapaj shuticuna causai quilcashca fangapi quilcashca canga. Nara 83 C.Ñ.

Alma 6

Zarahemlapi iglesiata jucha illa tucuchun, ali catichun saquin—Alma Gedeónpaman rin yachachingapa. Nara 83 C.Ñ.

Alma 7

Cristo Maríamanda naciringa—Pai cacharichinga huañuipaj huatanacunamanda, paipilla chasquinga paipaj llactapuracunapaj juchacunata—Maijan arrepentirijcuna, bautizarijpi, rurachunbacha saquishcacunata alichijpi mana tucurina causaita charinga—Mapalla Diospaj reinota na chasqui ushan—Humildad, fe, shuyai, caridadpash minishtirishcacuna can. Nara 83 C.Ñ.

Alma 8

Alma Melekpi yachachin bautizanbash—Ammoníahpi na chasquin llujshishpa rinbash—Shuj ángel mandan tigrachun arrepentimientota caparishpa yachachichunbash llactapuracunaman—Amulekhuan chasqui tucushca can, ishcandi Ammoníahpi yachachin. Nara 82 C.Ñ.

Alma 9

Alma Ammoníahpaj llactapuracunata arrepentirichun mandan—Apunchij Lamanitacunata tucuri punllacunapi llaquij canga—Nefitacuna michata saquijpica tucuchishca canga Lamanitacunahuan—Diospaj Churi ñalla shamunga—Pai jatun causachinga maijan arrepentirijcunata, bautizarishcacunatapash, paipaj shutipi feta charijcunatapash. Nara 82 C.Ñ.

Alma 10

Lehi Manaséspaj cati aillu carca—Amulek villan ángel mandashcata pai Almata ricuchun—Ali rurajcunapaj achil mañaicuna llactapuracunata huacaichin—Na ali abogadocuna ricushpa chasquichijcunapash imamanda llactapuracunata tucuchinata churan. Nara 82 C.Ñ.

Alma 11

Nefitacunapaj culquicunahuan imata ruranata aliguta yachachin—Amulek Zeezromhuan fiñanajun—Cristo na quishpichingachu llactapuracunata paicunapaj juchacunapi—Maijanlla pimi jahua pachapaj reinota chasquij quishpichishca canga—Tucui runacuna jataringa ñana huañunapi—Huañui na tianllu Cutin Causarishca jipa. Nara 82 C.Ñ.

Alma 12

Alma Zeezromhuan fiñanajun—Diospaj na villashcacunaca fielcunamanlla cushca canga—Runacuna ricushpa chasquichishca canga paicunapaj yuyaicunamanda, crinamanda, shimicunamanda, ruraicunamandalla—Na alita rurajcunaca shuj espiritual huañuita llaqui yalinga—Cai pachapi causai ruran na ruran ricungapa cana can—Jatun causachinapaj plan Cutin Causarinata yalichun apamun, femanda, juchacunata anchuchina—Arrepentimiento alicaita mañangapa derechota charin Shujlla Churimanda. Nara 82 C.Ñ.

Alma 13

Jaricuna sumo sacerdotecuna cachun cayai tucushca paicunapaj ninan femanda ali ruraicunamandapash—Paicuna rurachunbacha saquishcacunata yachachichun can—Ali ruraimanda paicuna achilyachishca canga Apunchijpaj samanapi yaicunbash—Caicunamanda shujca Melquisedec carca—Ángelcuna mushuj cushijunacunata tucui alpacunapi villanajun—Paicuna Cristopaj shamunata shinapacha canata villanga. Nara 82 C.Ñ.

Alma 14

Alma, Amulekpash cárcel macai tucushcapash can—Crijcuna paicunapaj achil quilcashcacunapash ninahuan rupachishca can—Cai ninan llaqui yalijcuna Apunchijpaj punchapambapi chasquishca can—Cárcel pircacuna chaupirishpa urmanbash—Alma, Amulekpash cacharichishca can, paicunapaj llaquichijcuna huañuchishca can. Nara 82–81 C.Ñ.

Alma 15

Alma Amulekpash Sidomman rin iglesiata shayachingapa—Alma Zeezromda jambin, pimi iglesiaman tandanajun—Taucacuna bautizarin, Iglesia ninanda miran—Alma Amulekpash Zarahemlaman rin. Nara 81 C.Ñ.

Alma 16

Lamanitacuna Ammoníahpaj llactapuracunata tucuchin—Zoram Nefitacunata pushan Lamanitacunata mishangapa—Alma Amulekpash tauca shujcunapash achil shimita villan—Paicuna yachachin Cristopaj cutin causarishca jipa Nefitacunaman ricurimunga. Nara 81–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 17

Mosíahpaj churicuna achil villachinapaj achil ricuchinapapash espírituta charin—Paicuna rin shuj shujlla shican ñangunata Lamanitacunaman achil shimita villashpa—Ammón Ismaelpaj alpaman rin, Jatun Mandaj Lamonipaj sirvij runaman tigran—Ammón jatun mandajpaj ataju llamacunata huacaichin paipaj na ricunayachishpa catijcunatapash Sebús yacu ladopi huañuchin. 1–3 versículocunapi, nara 77 C.Ñ.; 4 versículopi, nara 91–77 C.Ñ.; 5–39 versículocunapi, nara 91 C.Ñ.

Alma 18

Jatun mandaj Lamoni Ammón Jatun Espíritu can yarca—Ammón jatun mandajman Rurashcamanda yachachin, runacunahuan Diospaj imashna randi cajta, jatun causachinapash Cristohuan shamun—Lamoni crin huañushca laya alpaman urman. Nara 90 C.Ñ.

Alma 19

Lamoni mana tucurina causaipaj michata chasquin ricunbash Jatun Causachijta—Paipaj huasipi causajcuna juizu chingashpa urman, taucacuna ángelcunata ricun—Ammón alchishpa charishca can juyailla ruraita ricuchimandalla—Pai bautizan taucacunata shayachinbash shuj iglesiata paicunaman. Nara 90 C.Ñ.

Alma 20

Apunchij Ammónda cachan Middoniman paipaj cárcel huauquicunata cacharichun—Ammón Lamonipash Lamonipaj taitahuan tuparin, pimi jatun mandaj can tucui alpacunapa—Ammón rucu jatun mandajta ruraipacha nin ari ninata paipaj huauquicunapaj libre cachun. Nara 90 C.Ñ.

Alma 21

Aarón Amalekitacunata Cristomanda, shujpa juchamanda huañushcamandapash yachachin—Aarón paipaj huauquicuna Middonipi cárcelai tucushca can—paicunapaj cacharichishca jipa, tandanajuna huasicunapi yachachin taucacuna crin—Lamoni religiónpaj libertadta saquin Ismaelpaj alpacunapi llactapuracunaman. Nara 90–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 22

Aarón Lamonipaj taitaman yachachin Rurashcamanda, Adánpaj urmai, jatun causachinapaj plandapash Cristomanda—Jatun mandaj tucui paipaj huasi ucupuracuna crijcunaman tigran—Nefitacuna Lamanitacunahuan alpa chaupirishcata ali villashca can. Nara 90–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 23

Libertad religiosa tucuiman villashca can—Lamanitacuna canchis alpacunapi llactacunapipash tigrarin—Paicunallata shutichirin Anti-Nefi-Lehitacuna llaquimanda librarinbash—Amalekitacuna, Amulonitacuna ciertopachata na chasquin. Nara 90–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 24

Lamanitacuna Diospaj llactapuracunahuan macanajungapa shamun—Anti-Nefi-Lehitacuna Cristopi cushijun ricungapa shamunbash ángelcuna—Paicuna ajllan huañuita charingapa na mitsarishpa—Ashtahuan Lamanitacuna tigran. Nara 90–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 25

Lamanitacunapaj macanajungapa quimiricuna caiman chaiman miran—Noépaj sacerdotecunapaj cati aillucuna tucurin imashna Abinadí achil villachishcashna—Tauca Lamanitacuna crijcuna tigrarin Anti-Nefi-Lehipaj llactapuracunaman tandanajunbash—Paicuna Cristopi crin Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacunata alichinbash. Nara 90–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 26

Ammón Apunchijpi cushijun—Apunchij fielcunata shinlliyachin yachajuicunatapash cushca can—Runacunapaj femanda huaranga almacuna arrepentimientoman apamui ushan—Dios tucui ushaita charin tucui cuzascunatapash yachan. Nara 90–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 27

Apunchij Ammónda mandan Anti-Nefi-Lehipaj llactapuracunata pushachun ali pushtuman—Almahuan tuparishpa Ammón ninanda cushijun paipaj shinllicai tucurin—Nefitacuna Anti-Nefi-Lehicunaman Jersón alpata cun—Paicuna shutichishca can Ammónpaj llactapuracuna. Nara 90–77 C.Ñ.

Alma 28

Lamanitacuna mishai tucushca can jatunbacha macanajuipi—Huaranga huarangacuna huañun—Na alita rurajcuna cachashca can na tucurina manllanayai canaman; alita rurajcuna nimaurapash na tucurina cushijuita tarin. Nara 77–76 C.Ñ.

Alma 29

Alma munan caparishpa yachachingapa arrepentimientota ángel laya munaihuan—Apunchij saquin yachachijcunata tucui jatun llactacunaman—Alma Apunchijpaj ruraicunapi cushijun, Ammónpaj paipaj huauquicunapaj éxitopipash. Nara 76 C.Ñ.

Alma 30

Korihor, anti-Cristo, Cristota asishpa ricun, Shujpa Juchamanda Huañuita, achil villachinapaj espíritutapash—Pai yachachin Dios na tiajta, runacunapaj urmanapash na tiajta, juchacunamanda castigopash na tiajta, Cristopash na tiajta—Alma testifican Cristo shamunata tucui cuzascuna ricuchin shuj Dios tiajta—Korihor shuj señalta mañan, upaman tigranbash—Aya Korihorman ricurishca carca shuj ángel laya, yachachishcapash carca imata ninata—Korihor sarui tucun huañunbash. Nara 76–74 C.Ñ.

Alma 31

Alma shuj misiónda ñaupaman apan apóstata Zoramitacunata tigrachimungapa—Zoramitacuna Cristota negan, ajllangapaj yanga yuyaipi crin, adoranbash na cambianalla achil mañaicunahuan—Misionerocuna Espíritu Santohuan jundashcacuna—Paicunapaj llaquicuna mishai tucushca carca Cristopaj cushijuipi. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 32

Alma huajchacunaman yachachin, paicunapaj llaquicuna humildeyachirca—Fe shuj shuyai can imapash na ricushcapi imami ciertopacha can—Alma testifican ángelcunaca achil yachachin runacunata, huarmicunata, huahuacunatapash—Alma achil shimita shuj muyuhuan parijashpa ricuchin—Cai tarpushca cana micuchishcapash cana—Shina cai viñan shuj yura tucungacaman maimanda mana tucurinapaj fucushcata tandachishca can. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 33

Zenós yachachirca runacuna achil mañana cajta, adoranapash cajta tucui pushtucunapi, shina ricushpa chasquinacuna anchurishca canga Churimanda—Zenoc yachachirca llaquina cushca can Churimanda—Moisés vichai alsarca jichushca pambapi Diospaj Churipaj shuj ricuchita. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 34

Amulek testifican achil shimica Cristopi cajta quishpichingapa—Imashpapash shujpa juchamanda huañuita na rurashca cajpi, tucui runacuna chingaringapacha—Tucui Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacuna Diospaj Churipaj sacrificioman ricuchin—Mana tucurina jatun causachinapaj planda fepi, arrepentimientopipash shayachishca can—Achil mañana temporalpa, espiritualpash achilyachinacunamanda—Cai causaipimi runacuna Diospaman yaicungapa prepararina—Cangunapaj quishpirinata ruraichi Diosta manllashpa. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 35

Achil shimita yachachishcacuna Zoramitacunapaj supercheríacunata tucuchin—Paicuna crijman tigrashcacunata excomulgan, pimi shina Ammónpaj llactapuracunahuan Jersónpi tandanajun—Alma llactapuracunapaj na ali ruraicunamanda llaquirin. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 36

Alma Helamánman testifican paipaj crijman tigrashcamanda shuj ángelta ricushca jipa—Llaquichi tucushca almapaj llaquiricunata charirca; pai mañarca Jesúspaj shutipi shina Diospaj nacirirca—Paipaj almata mishqui cushijui jundarca—tandanajushca ángelcuna Diosta adoranajujta ricurca—Taucacuna crijman tigrarca malishca, ricushcapash imashna pai malishca, ricushcapash. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 37

Bronce jirru fangacuna, cutishuj achil quilcashcacunapash alchishpa charishca carca almacunata quishpirinaman apamungapa—Jareditacuna tucuchi tucushca carca paicunapaj na ali ruraicunamanda—Paicunapaj pacalla juramentocuna, pactachinacunapash llactapuracunamanda pacajushca cana—Cangunapaj tucui ruranacunapi Apunchijta tapui—Imashna Nefitacunata Liahona pusharca, shina Cristopaj achil shimi runacunata mana tucurina causaiman pushan. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 38

Shiblón ali rurajcaimanda na ricunayachishca carca—Cristopi quishpirina can, pimi causai can, cai pachapaj micha—Canbaj tucui jatun munaicunata jarcai. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 39

Sexual jucha can shuj millanayai—Coriantónba juchacuna Zoramitacunata na saquirca achil shimita chasquichun—Cristopaj jatun causachina punda fielcunapa can, quishpichingapa picuna paita ñauparca. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 40

Cristo tucui runacunapaj cutin causarinata yalichun apamun—Ali rurajcuna huañushca paraísoman rin, na alita rurajcuna canlla yana yana pushtuman paicunapaj cutin causarina punllata shuyangapa—Tucui cuzascuna cutinlla apamushca canga paicunapaj propio alipacha formamanbash Cutin Causaripi. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 41

Cutin Causarinapi runacuna jatarin na tucurinata charij cushijuipa nacashpa na tucurina charij llaquinayaiman—Na alita ruraica nimaurapash na cushijui carca—Aichal runacuna Dios illacuna can cai pachapi—Cutinlla apamunapi cai causaipi imashna cashcacunata imashnapacha cashcacunata tucui runacuna cutin chasquin. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 42

Cai pacha causaica can shuj rurajta na rurajta ricuna punlla, runacunata saquin arrepentirichun Diosta sirvichunbash—Urmaica apamurca temporal, espiritual huañuita tucui runacunaman—Jatun Causachina shamun arrepentimientomanda—Dios paillata cai pachapaj juchacunamanda huañun—Shungumanda llaquina maijan arrepentirijcunapa can—Tucuicuna Diospaj alicaipa munaiman curishcacuna can—Shungumanda llaquina shamun shujpa juchamanda huañuimanda—Ciertopacha arrepentiringapa munanajujcunalla quishpichishca can. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 43

Alma paipaj churicunapash achil shimita yachachin—Zoramitacuna cutishuj chaupirishca Nefitacunapash Lamanitacunaman tigran—Lamanitacuna Nefitacunahuan macanajuiman shamun—Moroni Nefitacunata macanajunacunahuan huacaichirichun churachin—Apunchij Almaman villan Lamanitacuna imata ruranajujta—Nefitacuna huacaichin paicunapaj huasicunata, libertad, aillucuna, religióndapash—Moronipaj Lehipapash macanajuj runacuna, Lamanitacunata muyun. Nara 74 C.Ñ.

Alma 44

Moroni Lamanitacunata sumaj causaipaj shuj pactachinata rurachun mandan nacashpa tucuchishca canga—Zerahemna cai nishcata na nin, macanajui callarin—Moronipaj macanajuj runacuna Lamanitacunata mishan. Nara 74–73 C.Ñ.

Alma 45

Helamán Almapaj shimicunata crin—Alma achil villan Nefitacunapaj tucuchinata—Pai achilyachin, llaquichinbash alpata—Alma Espírituhuan apai tucunbash, Moiséstashna—Ninanda fiñarishpa rimarinacuna miran Iglesiapi. Nara 73 C.Ñ.

Alma 46

Amalickíah jatun mandaj cangapa pacalla mascan—Moroni libertadpaj estandarteta vichai jatarichin—Pai llactapuracunata tangachin huacaichichun paicunapaj religiónda—Ciertopacha crijcuna shutichishca can Cristianocuna—Puchu Josépaj miraicuna alchishpa charishca canga—Amalickíah, chaupirishcacunapash Nefipaj alpaman pacajushpa rin—Maijanguna libertadta na shinllichijcuna huañuchishcacuna can. Nara 73–72 C.Ñ.

Alma 47

Amalickíah traiciónhuan, huañuchijhuan, pacalla ruraicunahuan Lamanitacunapaj jatun mandaj tucun—Chaupirishca Nefitacunamanda Lamanitacunata yali ashtahuan na alita rurajcuna, sacha runa layacuna can. Nara 72 C.Ñ.

Alma 48

Amalickíah Lamanitacunata tangachin Nefitacunapaj contra—Moroni paipaj llactapuracunata preparachin Cristianocuna canata huacaichichun—Pai cushijun libertadpi, libre canapipapash Diospaj shinllipash runa can. Nara 72 C.Ñ.

Alma 49

Mishashpa purij Lamanitacuna na ushan japita Ammoníah, Noépash shinllichishca llactacunata—Amalickíah Diosta llaquichin juranbash Moronipaj yahuarta ufiangapa—Helamán, paipaj huauquicunapash iglesiata shinllichishpa catin. Nara 72 C.Ñ.

Alma 50

Moroni Nefitacunapaj alpacunata shinllichin—Tauca mushuj llactacunata huasichin—Nefitacuna macanajuicunata, tucuchicunatapash yalirca paicunapaj na ali rurai punllacunapi, millanayaicunapipash—Moriantón paipaj chaupirishcacunapash mishai tucurca Teáncumhuan—Nefíah huañun, paipaj churi Pahorán ricushpa chasquichina jatun tiarinata japin. Nara 72–67 C.Ñ.

Alma 51

Jatun mandajta charingapa munaj runacuna catichunbacha saquishcacunata cambiangapa mascan, shuj jatun mandajta churan—Pahorán, libre runacunapash shinllichishca can llactapuracunapaj shimirimaihuan—Moroni ruraipacha nin jatun mandajta charingapa munaj runacunata paicunapaj llactata huacaichichun nacashpaca huañuiman churachun—Amalickíah, Lamanitacunapash mishan tauca shinllichishca llactacunata—Teáncum huashaman tigrachin Lamanitacunapaj mishaita huañuchinbash Amalickíahta paipaj facha huasipi. Nara 67–66 C.Ñ.

Alma 52

Ammorón catin Amalickíahta Lamanitacunapaj jatun mandaj laya—Moroni, Teáncum, Lehi pushan Nefitacunata ali mishai macanajuipi Lamanitacunapaj contra—Mulekpaj llacta cutin japishca can, Jacob Zoramita runa huañun. Nara 66–64 C.Ñ.

Alma 53

Lamanitacunapaj prezucuna Ashtacapacha Tiaj llactata shinlliyachingapa can—Nefitacunapamanda ninanda fiñarishpa rimarinacuna Lamanitacunata mishachin—Helamán mandaita japin ishcai huaranga viñaj huambracunata Ammónpaj llactapuracunapaj churicuna. Nara 64–63 C.Ñ.

Alma 54

Ammorón, Moronihuan prezucunata tigrachingapa parlarin—Moroni mañan Lamanitacuna anchurishpa richun, saquichunbash paicunapaj huañuchi mascaicunata—Ammorón mañan Nefitacuna paicunapaj macanajunacunata cuchun Lamanitacunapa munaiman curichunbash. Nara 63 C.Ñ.

Alma 55

Moroni prezucunata randipash na cusha nin—Lamanita ricuj runacunata machachun munachin, Nefita prezucuna cacharishcacuna can—Gid llacta japishca can yahuarta na jichashpa. Nara 63–62 C.Ñ.

Alma 56

Helamán shuj cartata Moroniman cachan, Lamanitacunahuan macanajuicuna imashna cajta villashpa—Antipus, Helamán Lamanitacunapaj jahuapi jatun mishaita charin—Ishcai huaranga Helamánpaj viñaj churicuna macanajun juyaillapacha ushaihuan, paicunamanda pipash na huañushca can. 1 versículopi, nara 62 C.Ñ.; 2–19 versículocunapi, nara 66 C.Ñ.; 20–57 versículocunapi, nara 65–64 C.Ñ.

Alma 57

Helamán villan Antipara llactata mishashcata, Cumeni ñana ushashpa saquirishcata jipaman paicuna huacaichirishcatapash—Paipaj Ammonita viñaj huambracuna millayashpa macanajun; tucui chugrishca can, ashtahuangari nipipash na huañun—Gid villan huañuita, pacajushpa rijpash prezu Lamanitacunapa. Nara 63 C.Ñ.

Alma 58

Helamán, Gid, Teómnerpash Manti llactata japin umachishpa—Lamanitacuna llujshin—Ammónpaj llactapuracunapaj churicuna alchishpa charishca can imashna paicuna shinllicuna cajpi paicunapaj libertadta, fetapash huacaichinapi. Nara 63–62 C.Ñ.

Alma 59

Moroni Pahoránda mañan Helamánpaj macanajujcunata shinllichichun—Lamanitacuna Nefíah llactata japin—Moroni fiñashca can gobiernohuan. Nara 62 C.Ñ.

Alma 60

Moroni Pahoránman quejarin gobiernopaj na ricuriashcamanda macanajuj runacunata—Apunchij saquin alicuna huañuchun—Nefitacuna tucui paicunapaj ushaita churan, imashnapash paicunamanda napacha ricunayachijcunapaj maquicunamanda charariringapa—Moroni gobiernohuan macanajungapa munan imashpapash paipaj macanajuj runacunaman ayudajllapi na. Nara 62 C.Ñ.

Alma 61

Pahorán Moroniman villan na cazuicunamanda, gobiernota na cazuitapash—Jatun mandajta charingapa munaj runacuna Zarahemlata japin Lamanitacunahuan tandanajushca can—Pahorán macanajuj runacunapaj ayudata mañan na cazujcunapaj contra. Nara 62 C.Ñ.

Alma 62

Moroni Pahoránda ayudangapa rin Gedeón alpapi—Jatun mandajta charingapa munaj runacuna paicunapa llactata na huacaichingapa munajcunata huañuchin—Pahorán, Moronipash Nefíahta cutin mishan—Tauca Lamanitacuna Ammónpaj llactapuracunahuan tandanajun—Teáncum Ammorónda huañuchin, randipash huañun—Lamanitacuna alpamanda calpan, sumaj causai shayachishca can—Helamán tigran achil yachachinaman iglesiata shayachinbash. Nara 62–57 C.Ñ.

Alma 63

Shiblón jipaman Helamán achil tandachishca quilcashcacunata japirca—Tauca Nefitacuna vichai alpacunaman rirca—Hagot barcocunata ruran, imacuna yacuta rirca jatun mama cocha indi huashajuj ladota—Moroníah Lamanitacunata mishan macanajuipi. Nara 56–52 C.Ñ.

Helamán






Helamán 1

Pahorán churi ricushpa chasquichijcunapaj yali mandaj tucun, Kishkumenmanda huañuchitucun—Pacumeni ricushpa chasquichina jatun tiarinata japin—Coriántumr Lamanitacunapaj macanajuj runacunata pushan, Zarahemlata japin, Pacumenita huañuchinbash—Moroníah Lamanitacunata mishan Zarahemlatapash cutin mishan, Coriántumrbash huañuchi tucushca can. Nara 52–50 C.Ñ.

Helamán 2

Helamán, Helamánpaj churi, ricushpa chasquichijcunapaj yali mandajman tigrarca—Gadiantón Kishkumenpaj tandanajushcata pushan—Helamánpaj sirvij runa Kishkumenda huañuchin, Gadiantón tandanajushcacuna calpan jichushca pambaman. Nara 50–49 C.Ñ.

Helamán 3

Tauca Nefitacuna vichai alpacunaman rin—Paicuna cemento huasicunata ruran, tauca tandachishpa quilcashcacunata alichin—Chunga huarangacuna crijman tigrarin, bautizarinbash—Diospaj shimi runacunata quishpirinaman pushan—Nefi Helamánpaj churi ricushpa chasquichina jatun tiarinata japin. Nara 49–39 C.Ñ.

Helamán 4

Nefitacuna chaupirin Lamanitacuna macanajujcunata tandachin Zarahemla alpata japin—Nefitacunapaman mishaicuna shamun paicunapaj na ali ruraicunamanda—Iglesia ashallayan, llactapuracuna ushai illacunaman tigran Lamanitacuna laya. Nara 38–30 C.Ñ.

Helamán 5

Nefi, Lehipash paicunallata yachachishpa catin—Paicunapaj shuticuna cumbidan paicunapaj punda taitacuna causashpa ali ricuchishcata catichun—Cristo maijan arrepentirijcunata quishpichin—Nefi, Lehipash taucacunata crijman tigrachi ushan, prezui tucurcapash, ninapash paicunata pillurca—Yana yanapaj fuyu quimsa huaranga llactapuracunata quilparca—Alpa mama chujchun, shuj shimi runacunata mandan arrepentirichun—Nefi, Lehipash ángelcunahuan parlan, ashtacapacha tandanajushcacuna ninahuan pillui tucushca can. Nara 30 C.Ñ.

Helamán 6

Alita ruraj Lamanitacuna na alita ruraj Nefitacunaman yachachin—Ishcandi llactapuracuna ali miran sumaj causai, ashtaca tiaj punllacunapi—Lucifer, juchacunata rurachij, na alita rurajcunapa shungucunata, Gadiantón shuhuacunata tangachin huañuchinapi, na ali ruraicunapipash—Shuhuacuna Nefita gobiernota japin. Nara 29–23 C.Ñ.

Helamán 7

Nefi na cazui tucun vichai alpapi Zarahemlaman tigramun—Achil mañan paipaj jardín torrepi shina llactapuracunata nin na arrepentirishpaca tucuringa. Nara 23–21 C.Ñ.

Helamán 8

Huaglipacha ali ricushpa chasquichijcuna mascan llactapuracunata cunvidangapa Nefipaj contra—Abraham, Moisés, Zenós, Zenoc, Ezías, Isaías, Jeremías, Lehi, Nefi tucuilla Cristomanda testificarca—Inspiraciónhuan Nefi villan ricushpa chasquichijcunapaj yali mandajta huañuchishcata. Nara 23–21 C.Ñ.

Helamán 9

Villajcuna ricushpa chasquichijcunapaj yali mandaj huañushcata tupan paipaj jatun tiarinapi—Cárcelpi churashca can jipaman cacharishca can—Inspiraciónmanda Nefi rijsin Seantum huañuchij cajta—Nefita huaquinguna chasquin shuj achil villachij laya. Nara 23–21 C.Ñ.

Helamán 10

Apunchij Nefiman cun sellana ushaita—Ushaita chasquin huatangapa, cacharichingapapash cai alpapi, jahua pachapipash—Pai mandan llactapuracuna arrepentirichun nacashpa tucuringa—Espíritu apan shuj ashtacapacha tandanajushcamanda shuj ashtacapacha tandanajushcacunaman. Nara 21–20 C.Ñ.

Helamán 11

Nefi Apunchijta mañan paicunapaj macanajuipa randi shuj ninan yarjaita cuchun—Tauca llactapuracuna huañun—Paicuna arrepentirin, Nefi Apunchijta mañan tamiata—Nefi, Lehipash chasquin tauca achil ricuchicunata—Gadiantón shuhuacuna alpapi paicunallata shinlliyan. Nara 20–6 C.Ñ.

Helamán 12

Runacuna cambiajllacuna can, juizu illacuna, ñapash na alita rurajcuna—Apunchij paipaj llactapuracunata castigan—Runacunapaj imapash na cai parijashpa ricuchishca can Diospaj ushaihuan—Ricushpa chasquichina punllapi, runacuna charinga mana tucurina causaita nacashpa mana tucurina condenaciónda. Nara 6 C.Ñ.

Helamán 13

Samuel shuj Lamanita achil villan Nefitacunapaj tucurinata imashpapash paicuna arrepentirijpilla na—Paicuna, paicunapaj charijyashcacunapash llaquichishca can—Paicuna na cazun achil villachijcunata rumihuan macan, ayacunahuan chaupipi churashcacuna can, cushijuita mascan na ali ruraicunata rurashpa. Nara 6 C.Ñ.

Helamán 14

Samuel tutacanapi micha tianata villan, shuj mushuj lucero Cristo nacirijpi—Cristo runacunata quishpichin temporal, espiritual huañuimanda—Paipaj huañuipaj señalcunapi quimsa yana yana punllacunata charin, faquiringapash rumicuna, jatun shinlli llaquichicunapash. Nara 6 C.Ñ.

Helamán 15

Apunchij Nefitacunata castigarca paicunata juyaimanda—Crijman tigrashca Lamanitacuna fepi shinlli na shaijujcuna can—Apunchij Lamanitacunata shungumanda llaquinga tucuri punllacunapi. Nara 6 C.Ñ.

Helamán 16

Nefi bautizan Nefitacunata maijan Samuelta crijcunata—Na arrepentirishca Nefitacunapaj flechacuna, rumicuna Samuelta na huañuchin—Huaquinguna paicunapaj shungucunata shinlliyachin, cutishujcuna ángelcunata ricun—Na crijcuna nin Cristopi na crinayai can, paipaj shamuita Jerusalénpi. Nara 6–1 C.Ñ.

3 Nefi






3 Nefi 1

Nefi, Helamánpaj churi, pambata saquishpaca rin, paipaj churi Nefi alichin tandachishca quilcashcacunata—Masqui señalcuna, juyailla ricurinacunapash ashtacapacha tiajpipash, na ali rurajcuna planda ruran huañuchingapa ali rurajcunata—Cristo nacirina tuta chayamun—Señal cushca can, shuj mushuj lucero ricurin—Llullaicuna, umachicunapash miran, Gadiantón shuhuacuna taucacunata huañuchin. Nara C.H. 1–4.

3 Nefi 2

Na ali ruraicuna, millanayaicunapash llactapuracunapi miran—Nefitacuna, Lamanitacunapash tandanajun paipuracuna huacaichiringapa Gadiantón shuhuacunamanda—Crijman tigrashca Lamanitacuna yurajman tigran Nefitacuna shutichishca can. Nara C.H. 5–16.

3 Nefi 3

Giddiani, Gadiantónpaj pushaj, mañanbacha Laconeota, Nefitacutanapash paicunamandallata saquichun paicunapaj pambacunatapash—Laconeo ajllan Gidgiddonita macanajuj runacunapaj yali mandaj capitán cachun—Nefitacuna tandanajun Zarahemlapi, Ashtacapacha Tiajpipash paicunamandallata huacaichiringapa. Nara C.H. 16–18.

3 Nefi 4

Nefita macanajuj runacuna Gadiantón shuhuacunata mishan—Giddiani huañun, paipaj cati Zemnaríah, huarcushca can—Nefitacuna Apunchijta alaban paicunapaj mishaicunamanda. Nara C.H. 19–22.

3 Nefi 5

Nefitacuna arrepentirin, paicunapaj juchacunata saquinbash—Mormón quilcan paipaj llactapuracuna imashna cashcata, paicunaman villan mana tucurina achil shimita—Israel tandanajushca canga paipaj caiman chaiman chajchurishcamanda. Nara C.H. 22–26.

3 Nefi 6

Nefitacuna ali miran—Jariyai, charijyai, huajcha caiman, charij caiman nijcuna mirarca—Iglesia chaupirishca can ninanda fiñarishpa rimarinacunahuan—Satanás apan llactapuracunata tucui ricujta na cazuiman—Tauca achil villachijcuna yachachin arrepentimientota, huañuchishcacuna can—Paicunata huañuchijcuna pacalla tandanajun gobiernota mishashpa japingapa. Nara C.H 26–30.

3 Nefi 7

Ricushpa chasquichijcunapaj yali mandaj huañuchishca can, gobierno tucurishca can, llactapuracuna chaupirin tribucunapi—Jacob, shuj anti-Cristo, shuj pacalla tandanajunacunapaj jatun mandaj tigran—Nefi yachachin arrepentimientota, Cristopi fetapash—Ángelcuna paiman achil yachachin punllan punllan, jatarichinbash paipaj huauquita huañuimanda—Tauca arrepentirin, bautizarinbash. Nara C.H. 30–33.

3 Nefi 8

Ushashca tamiacuna, alpa chujchuicuna, rupaicuna, acapanacuna, alpapaj manllanayai tucuricuna villanbacha Cristopaj cruzpi chacatarinata—Tauca llactapuracuna tucuchishca canga—Quimsa punllacunata pambata tutalla quilpanga—Maijan puchushcacuna huacan paicunapaj ima canamanda. Nara C.H. 33–34.

3 Nefi 9

Yanamangapi, Cristopaj shimi villan tauca llactapuracunapaj llactacunapaj tucuchita paicunapaj na ali ruraicunamanda—Pai villanbash paipaj divinidadta, villarca Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacuna pactashca cajta, cunvidarca runacunata shamuchun paipaman quishpiringapa. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 10

Tucui chulunllagu tian pambapi tauca horascunata—Cristopaj shimi ninbacha paipaj llactapuracunata tandachingapa imashna shuj atalpa tandachin paipaj uchilla pollogucunata—Llactapuracunapaj ashtahuan alita rurashcacuna alchishpa charishca carca. Nara C.H. 34–35.

3 Nefi 11

Taita testifican paipaj Juyashca Churimanda—Cristo ricurimun shujpa juchamanda huañunamanda villan—Llactapuracuna tacarin chugri marcacunata paipaj maquicunapi, chaquicunapi costadopipash—Paicuna caparin Hosanna—Pai yachachin imashna, ima laya cana bautismo—Randimanda pliturinapaj espíritu ayapaj can—Cristopaj yachachishca can runacuna crinapacha, bautizarishca cana, Espíritu Santota chasquina. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 12

Jesús achil cayan, comisionanbash Chunga Ishcaita—Pai parlan Nefitacunaman shuj discursota Urcupi Yachachishca layata—Pai parlan Bienaventuranzascunata—Paipaj yachachishcacuna yalin Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacunata—Runacunata mandan alipachacuna cachun imashna pai can, paipaj Taitapash alipacha can—Mateo 5-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 13

Jesús Nefitacunata Apunchijpaj Achil Mañaita yachachin—Paicuna jahua pachapi charijyanacunata mirachinga—Chunga ishcai paicunapaj achil yachachinapi mandashca can temporal cuzascunapi ama yapata yachun—Mateo 6-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 14

Jesús mandan: Ama ricushpa chasquichi; Diosta mañai; yanga achil villachijcunamanda cuidado cai—Pai quishpichisha ninbacha maijanguna Taitapaj munaita rurajcunata—Mateo 7-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 15

Jesús villachin Moiséspaj catichunbacha saquishcacuna paipi pactashca can—Nefitacuna can cutishuj llamagucuna picunamanda Jerusalénpi parlarca—Na ali ruraicunamanda, Jerusalénpi Apunchijpaj llactapuracuna na yacharca Israelpaj llamagucuna caiman chaiman chajchurishcata. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 16

Jesús ricungapa ringa cutishuj Israelpaj chingashca llamagucunata—Tucuri punllacuna quishpiringapa villaicuna ringa Gentilcunapaman jipaman Israelpaj huasiman—Apunchijpaj llactapuracuna ricunga ñavi ñavi imaura pai Siónda cutin tigrachimujpi. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 17

Jesús tigrashpa yachachin llactapuracunata paipaj shimicunata aliguta yarichun, achil mañachun intidimientota—Pai jambin paicunapaj unguicunata—Pai achil mañan llactapuracunamanda, na quilcai ushanalla shimicunata nishpa—Ángelcuna achil yachachin paicunapaj uchilla huahuagucunata paicuna rupajuj ninahuan muyui tucushca can. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 18

Jesús Santa Cenata Nefitacunaman churan—Paicuna mandai tucushca can achil mañachun punllan punllan paipaj shutipi—Maijan micun paipaj aichata, ufianbash paipaj yahuarta na ali cashpata llaquichi tucushca can—Discípulocunaman cushca can ushaita Espíritu Santota cungapa. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 19

Chunga ishcai discípulocuna achil yachachin llactapuracunata, achil mañan chasquingapa Espíritu Santota—Discípulocuna bautizashcacuna can, chasquinbash Espíritu Santota, Ángelcunapaj achil yachachipash—Jesús achil mañan na quilcai ushanalla shimicunahuan—Testifican cai Nefitacunapaj jatun ninanbacha femanda. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 20

Jesús caran tandata, vinotapash juyailla ruraita ricuchishpa, cutin achilyachin santa cenata llactapuracunaman—Jacobpaj puchushca shamunga Apunchij paicunapaj Diosmanda yachaiman, Américata chasquinga—Jesús achil villachij can Moisés laya, Nefitacuna can achil villachijcunapaj huahuacuna—Cutishuj Apunchijpaj llactapuracuna tandachishca canga Jerusalénpi. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 21

Israel tandanajushca canga imaura Mormónpaj Quilcashca llujshijpi—Gentilcuna shayachishca canga shuj libre llactapuracunashna Américapi—Paicuna quishpirishca canga paicuna crijpi, cazujpipash; cutishuj laya, paicuna anchuchi tucushca, tucuchi tucushcapash canga—Israel Mushuj Jerusalénda huasichinga, chingashca tribucunapash tigramunga. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 22

Tucuri punllacunapi, Sión, paipaj estacacunapash shayachishca canga, Israel tandanajushca canga shungumanda llaquinapi, llaquishpapash—Paicuna mishanga—Isaías 54-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 23

Jesús aproban Isaíaspaj shimicunata—Mandan llactapuracuna achil villachijcunata mascachun—Samuel shuj Lamanitapaj Cutin Causarinamanda shimicunata paicunapaj tandachishca quilcashcacunapi mirachishca can. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 24

Apunchijpaj villachijcuna ñanda alichinga Cati Shamuipa—Cristo ricushpa chasquichinga—Israelta mandashca can pagachun diezmota ofrendacunatapash—Shuj yuyarina quilcashca alichishca can—Malaquías 3-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 25

Cati Shamuipi, jariyaj, na alita ruraj jupa laya rupachishca canga—Elías tigramunga chai jatun manllanayai punlla nara cajpi—Malaquías 4-huan parijashpa ricui. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 26

Jesús aliguta villan tucui cuzascunata callarimanda tucurinacaman—Uchilla huahuacuna, huahuacunapash parlan juyailla cuzascunata na quilcashca cai ushajta—Cristopaj iglesiamandacuna charin tucui cuzascunata pacta paipuracuna. Nara C.H. 34.

3 Nefi 27

Jesús mandan paicunata Iglesiata paipaj shutipi shutichichun—Paipaj misión, shujpa juchamanda huañui sacrificiopash paipaj quishpiringapa villaicuna can—Runacuna mandashca can arrepentirichun, bautizarichun paicuna achilyachishca cachun Espíritu Santohuan—Paicuna cana can imashna Jesús can shina laya. Nara C.H. 34–35.

3 Nefi 28

Chunga ishcaimanda iscun munan, nishcapachacunapash can shuj chasquinata Cristopaj reinopi imaura paicuna huañujpi—Quimsa Nefitacuna munan huañui jahuapa ushaita cushcapash can shina cai ushachun alpapi imaura Jesús cutin shamungacaman—Paicuna apashca can, ricunbash cuzascunata villai na saquishcata, paicuna cunan runacunapi achil yachachinajun. Nara C.H. 34–35.

3 Nefi 29

Mormónpaj Quilcashca llujshimui shuj señal can Apunchij callarishca Israelta tandachita paipaj conveniocunata pactachijpash—Maijan na cazun paipaj achil ricuchishcacunata, carashcacunata tucuri punllapi llaquichishca canga. Nara C.H. 34–35.

3 Nefi 30

Tucuri punllapaj Gentilcuna mandashca can arrepentirichun, Cristoman shamuna, yupashca cachun Israelpaj huasihuan. Nara C.H. 34–35.

4 Nefi

Nefitacuna, Lamanitacunapash tucuilla tigrarin Apunchijpaman—Paicuna tucui cuzascunata pacta charin, juyailla ruraita ricuchicunata ruran, pambapi ali miranbash—Ishcai patsaj huatacuna jipa, chaupiricuna, na alicunata ruraicuna, yanga iglesiacuna, na ricunayachishpa catiriaicuna jatarirca—Quimsa patsaj huatacuna jipa, Nefitacuna, Lamanitacuna na ali rurajcuna can—Ammorón pacan achil tandachishpa quilcashcacunata. Nara C.H. 35–321.

Mormón






Mormón 1

Ammarón yachachin Mormónman achil tandachishca quilcashcacunamanda—Macanajuicuna callarin Nefitacunahuan, Lamanitacunahuan—Quimsa Nefitacuna apai tucushca can—Na alita ruraicuna, na crina, hechicería, brujeríacunapash ashtahuan tian. Nara C.H. 321–326.

Mormón 2

Mormón Nefitacunapaj macanajuj runacunata pushan—Yahuar huañuchishpa tucuchicunapash tiarca alpa jahuapi—Nefitacuna quijarin, huacanbash llaquichi tucushcacunapaj llaquihuan—Paicunapaj ninan juyai punlla yalishca can—Mormón chasquin Nefipaj jirru fangacunata—Macanajuicuna catin. Nara C.H. 327–350.

Mormón 3

Mormón Nefitacunaman arrepentimientota yachachin—Paicuna jatun mishaita charin paicunapaj shinllicaipi jariyan—Mormón paicunata na pushasha nin, paipaj achil mañaicuna paicunamanda fe illa can—Mormónpaj Quilcashca cumbidan chunga ishcai Israelpaj tribucunata quishpiringapa villaicunapi crichun. Nara C.H. 360–362.

Mormón 4

Macanajui, huañuchishpa tucuchicuna catirca—Na alita rurajcuna castigan na alita rurajcunata—Imaurapash shina na tiashca jatun na ali ruraicuna yali miran tucui Israelpi—Huarmicuna, huahuacunapash yanga diosman sacrificashca can—Lamanitacuna paicunapaj ñaupamanda Nefitacunata calpachi callarin. Nara C.H. 363–375.

Mormón 5

Mormón cutin Nefita macanajuj runacunata pushan huañuchishpa tucuchina macanajuicunapi—Mormónpaj Quilcashca llujshimun convencengapa tucui Israelta Jesús Cristo cajta—Paicunapaj na crimanda, Lamanitacuna caiman chaiman chajchui tucushca can, Espíritu paicunahuan macanajuita saquinga—Paicuna chasquinga quishpiringapa villaicunata Gentilcunamanda tucuri punllacunapi. Nara C.H. 375–384.

Mormón 6

Nefitacuna tandanajun Cumorahpaj alpapi tucuri macanajuipa—Mormón pacan achil quilcashcacunata Cumorah urcupi—Lamanitacuna mishan, Nefita jatun llacta tucurishca can—Huaranga huarangacuna espadahuan huañuchishca can. Nara C.H. 385.

Mormón 7

Mormón Lamanitacunata cumbidan tucuri punllacunapi Cristopi crichun, paipaj quishpiringapa villaicunata chasquichun, quishpirichunbash—Tucui maijan Bibliapi crin Mormónpaj Quilcashcatapash cringa. Nara C.H 385.

Mormón 8

Lamanitacuna mascan, tucuchinbash Nefitacunata—Mormónpaj Quilcashca llujshimunga Diospaj ushaihuan—Llaquicunata villashca can maijan Apunchijpaj ruraipaj contra, fiñai, macanajui samaita aisajcunapaj jahuapi—Nefitapaj quilcashca llujshimunga na alita rurai, jucha rurai, apostasía punllapi. Nara C.H. 400–421.

Mormón 9

Moroni cayan maijan Cristopi na crijcunata arrepentirichun—Pai villan shuj Dios juyailla ruraita ricuchicunapaj, pimi cun achil ricuchicunata jichanbash caraicunata, señalcunatapash fielcuna jahuapi—Juyailla ruraita ricuchinacuna tucurin na crijcunamanda—Señalcuna catin maijan crijcunata—Runacunata yachajcuna cachun cutin yarichishca can rurachunbacha saquishcacunata alichichunbash. Nara C.H. 401–421.

Éter






Éter 1

Moroni tandachin Éterpaj quilcashcacunata—Éterpaj genealogíata rijsichishca can—Jareditacunapaj shimirimaicunata na pandachishca can Babelpaj Torrepi—Apunchij paicunata pushasha ninbacha shuj ajllashca alpaman paicunata rurangapa shuj jatun llactata.

Éter 2

Jareditacuna prepararin ringapa cushapacha nishca pambaman—Cai can shuj ajllashca alpa maipi runacuna Cristota sirvinapacha nacashpa tucuchishca canga—Apunchij parlan Jaredpaj huauquihuan quimsa horascunata—Jareditacuna ruran barcocunata—Apunchij tapun Jaredpaj huauquita ima laya barcocuna punchayachishca canata nichun.

Éter 3

Jaredpaj huauqui ricun Apunchijpaj dedota imashna pai tacarin chunga sujta rumicunata—Cristo ricuchin paipaj espíritupaj cuerpota Jaredpaj huauquiman—Maijan shuj alipacha yachaita charij na jarcan velomanda—Yalichinacuna cushca can Jareditacunapaj tandachishpa quilcashcacunata michaman llujshi ushachun.

Éter 4

Moroni mandai tucushca can sellachun Jaredpaj huauqui quilcashcacunata—Caicuna na achil ricuchishca canga imaura runacuna Jaredpaj huauqui laya feta charingacaman—Cristo mandan runacunata paipaj shimicunapi crichun maijan paipaj discípulocunata—Runacuna mandai tucushca can arrepentirichun, crichun quishpiringapa villaicunata, quishpirichunbash.

Éter 5

Quimsa testigocuna, ruraillatapash shayaringa shuj testigo laya Mormónpaj Quilcashcapaj ciertopachamanda.

Éter 6

Jaredita yacupi huanbujcuna huairacunahuan tangashca can cushapacha nishca alpaman—Llactapuracuna Apunchijta alaban paipaj alicaimanda—Oríah ajllashca can jatun mandaj cachun—Jared, paipaj huauquipash huañun.

Éter 7

Oríah reinan rectitudpi—Shulepaj, Cohorpaj shinallata reinocuna shayarishca can, ushaita shuhuangapa, macanajui chaupipi—Achil Villachijcuna na alicachin llactapurapaj na ali ruraicunata, yanga dioscunata cungurinacunata, maijanguna jipaman arrepentirin.

Éter 8

Tiarca macanajuicuna, randimanda plituricuna reinomanda—Akish ruran shuj juramentoshca pacalla tandanajunacuna jatun mandajta huañuchingapa—Pacalla tandanajushcacuna ayapaj can, chaimanda catin jatun llactacunapaj tucuripi—Moderno Gentilcunata tigrashpa yarichin pacalla tandanajushcacunapaj contra cai mascanga libertad tucuchingapa tucui alpacunapaj, llactacuna, jatun llactacuna.

Éter 9

Reino yalin shujmanda cutishujman cati aillucunahuan, pacalla ruraihuan, huañuchihuanbash—Emer ricurca Ali Ruranapaj Churita—Tauca achil villachijcuna yachachin arrepentimientota—Shuj ninan yarjai, venenosa culebracuna llactapuracunata llaquichin.

Éter 10
